## ğŸ’œğŸ“š About

**EN** = Movie Search is a web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that leverages the OMDb API to fetch movie details. Users can search for movies by title or IMDb ID, accessing information such as movie name, duration, genre, plot synopsis, IMDb rating, IMDb ID, country of origin, content rating, release year, and Metascore rating. With an intuitive and responsive interface, Movie Search offers a seamless browsing experience, allowing users to discover details about their favorite films effortlessly.

Os usuÃ¡rios podem pesquisar filmes pelo tÃ­tulo ou ID IMDb, acessando informaÃ§Ãµes como nome do filme, duraÃ§Ã£o, gÃªnero, sinopse, classificaÃ§Ã£o IMDb, IMDb ID, paÃ­s de origem, classificaÃ§Ã£o indicativa, ano de lanÃ§amento e pontuaÃ§Ã£o no Metascore. ## ğŸ› ï¸ Features

- ğŸ“± **Responsive Design:** Movie Search is designed with a responsive layout, ensuring a consistent user experience across a variety of devices, from desktops to smartphones.

- âš™ï¸ **Modularized Code:** The source code of Movie Search is organized in a modular way, making it easy to maintain, update, and expand the project.

- ğŸ“‚ **Local Storage Saving:** Users have the ability to save their favorite pages locally using the browser's local storage feature, allowing them to resume browsing from where they left off.

- ğŸ”— **Integration with OMDb API:** Movie Search utilizes the OMDb API (https://www.omdbapi.com/) to access and display detailed information about movies, including title, cast, ratings, plot synopsis, and more.
